verses.name: Joshua 9:15
verses.text: And Joshua made peace with them, and made a league with them, to let them live: and the princes of the congregation sware unto them.

verses.name: Joshua 9:16
verses.text: And it came to pass at the end of three days after they had made a league with them, that they heard that they were their neighbours, and that they dwelt among them.

verses.name: Joshua 9:17
verses.text: And the children of Israel journeyed, and came unto their cities on the third day. Now their cities were Gibeon, and Chephirah, and Beeroth, and Kirjath–jearim.
